## Functions

### collectVFSFromYAML() {#a46113a125eb290e06b4d7fa98225a616}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::vfs::collectVFSFromYAML (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorybuffer">llvm::MemoryBuffer</a> &gt; Buffer, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sourcemgr/#acf78be89ec851a45f37a776a5a58bfe8">llvm::SourceMgr::DiagHandlerTy</a> DiagHandler, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> YAMLFilePath, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfs/yamlvfsentry">YAMLVFSEntry</a> &gt; &amp; CollectedEntries, void &#42; DiagContext=nullptr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrusiverefcntptr">IntrusiveRefCntPtr</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/filesystem">FileSystem</a> &gt; ExternalFS=<a href="#a9878c6a5a53d24e17c7c1002be31364c">getRealFileSystem</a>())</>}>
Collect all pairs of &lt;virtual path, real path&gt; entries from the <code>YAMLFilePath</code>.

This is used by the module dependency collector to forward the entries into the reproducer output VFS YAML file.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/virtualfilesystem-h/#l01110">1110</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/virtualfilesystem-h">VirtualFileSystem.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createPhysicalFileSystem() {#a6b309a3a56a77467114e10a162bcc2a3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; FileSystem &gt; llvm::vfs::createPhysicalFileSystem ()</>}>
Create an <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/filesystem">vfs::FileSystem</a></code> for the &#39;real&#39; file system, as seen by the operating system.

It has its own working directory, independent of (but initially equal to) that of the process.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/virtualfilesystem-h/#l00379">379</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/virtualfilesystem-h">VirtualFileSystem.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/virtualfilesystem-cpp/#l00404">404</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/virtualfilesystem-cpp">VirtualFileSystem.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/virtualfilesystem-h/#l00654">654</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/virtualfilesystem-h">VirtualFileSystem.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/virtualfilesystem-cpp/#l02729">2729</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/virtualfilesystem-cpp">VirtualFileSystem.cpp</a>.

### getRealFileSystem() {#a9878c6a5a53d24e17c7c1002be31364c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>IntrusiveRefCntPtr&lt; FileSystem &gt; llvm::vfs::getRealFileSystem ()</>}>
Gets an <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/filesystem">vfs::FileSystem</a></code> for the &#39;real&#39; file system, as seen by the operating system.

The working directory is linked to the process&#39;s working directory. (This is usually thread-hostile).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/virtualfilesystem-h/#l00373">373</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/virtualfilesystem-h">VirtualFileSystem.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/virtualfilesystem-cpp/#l00399">399</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/virtualfilesystem-cpp">VirtualFileSystem.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
